This is what you see when visiting armani.com on a device without Flash installed. Funnily enough, the experience is much worse with Flash installed. Browsing high end suits online is frustrating to say the least. You’re contending with extremely Flash heavy sites that take forever to load navigation schemes I cannot comprehend.

When you’re selling $1500+ outfits where brand is everything you’d think you’d be able to get a website made that isn’t a piece of shit. Give me a few suits, a month or two and I’ll fucking do it.

Meanwhile the sites selling rip offs like Italian Cart are doing a much better job.
